Reviews.Title: Excellen
Reviews.Author: Alaa El Ladkani
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV with hesitation at first!It turned out to be excellent...I am using it in my dorm room and it is much more than i could ask for...The best money i ever spent. Totally worth every penny!

Reviews.Title: Great TV - Great Price
Reviews.Author: C. Shipp
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV for a year.  It was bought for my 7 year olds bedroom.  Perfect size and great picture

ProductInfo.Features:
PC input allows you to use the TV as a computer monitor.
The RLC195EMX provides the highest performance and quality at a most affordable price.
ProductInfo.Name: Emerson RLC195EMX 19" Class LCD HDTV
